summary:
This mod will add a Female nord companion who has a ablilty to transform into
any Race while in combat.After combat end she will automatically back to her
orginal form.
descriptionHtml:
=========================================================================================
Skin-Walker Follower
=========================================================================================
If you get bored with your vanilla follower then this mod is for you.This mod will add a follower
Who can transform into any beast form of your choice.
I always wanted a beast follower for myself but having so many beast follower following you
doesn\'t look good.so i created a one follower who can turn into any beast form of your choice.
=========================================================================================

Description
===================================================================================================

This mod will add a Female nord companion who has a ability to transform into
any dangerous beast race while in combat.After combat end she will automatically back to her
orginal form.If have a Dawnguard expansion then by default she will become vampire lord.

=========================================================================================

You can found her near Woodmill in Riverwood Village.

=========================================================================================

She Is Leveled with Player.

=========================================================================================

She has a ability to heal you in combat.

=========================================================================================

She automatically cures Your diseases.Except Vampirism You still get infected to
turn into vampires.
 
=========================================================================================

she can wear anything you put in her inventory.

=========================================================================================


There are two types of Options to select her race.
1.Manual Race Select
2.Auto Race Select.

==================================================================================
Manual Race Select.

On installing the mod a new TransformOptions Spell will automatically added to
Conjuration select.Currently you get 16 beast race choice to select.I will add
many more later.

Use the Spell to manually the select the race of follower.

==================================================================================
Auto Race select

Use transformoptions Spell to toggle on/Off Auto race select.

On enabling this setting the Follower will automatically takes the 
race of Players target Actor and transform into that race.

If the player target is npc or dragon she will not transform in Autostate.

======================================================================================

She is fully Compatible with any follower tweaks mods.
It will not conflict with any other mods.

======================================================================================

Installation

=====================================================================================
There are two files one with Vanilla version and another with dawnguard version.
If you have dawnguard expansion then download dawnguard version otherwise download
vanilla version.
More dawnguard races added in dawnguard version.

===================================================================================
Known Bugs
======================================================================================
Sometimes she will not adopt the combatstyle of the target.I am working on it and will
solve it very soon.
No other known bugs.
Please leave comments if find any other bugs.
========================================================================================

If you like the mod Please Endorsed it.

=======================================================================================
Thank You


Watch Video For more details.

[youtube]7TbIUPNmYlM[/youtube]
author: Praveen
